mapper.select: SELECT p.postid, p.title, p.price, p.image FROM productposttbl p JOIN liketbl l ON p.postid = l.postid WHERE l.userno = #{userNo} AND p.productstatus = 1
SELECT p.postid, p.title, p.price, p.image FROM productposttbl p JOIN purchasecomptbl c ON p.postid = c.postid WHERE c.buyerno = #{userNo}
SELECT p.postid, p.title, p.price, p.image FROM productposttbl p JOIN purchasecomptbl c ON p.postid = c.postid WHERE p.userno = #{userNo}
SELECT p.postid, p.title, p.price, p.image FROM productposttbl p LEFT JOIN purchasecomptbl c ON p.postid = c.postid WHERE p.userno = #{userNo} AND c.postId IS NULL

select P.postId , C.ctgName , U.userId , A.sido , A.sigungu , A.town , P.title , P.price , P.details , P.image , P.creationDate , P.productStatus from productposttbl P LEFT OUTER JOIN usertbl U ON P.userno = U.userno LEFT OUTER JOIN addresstbl A ON P.addressId = A.addressId LEFT OUTER JOIN ctgtbl C ON P.ctgid = C.ctgid WHERE P.productStatus = 1

SELECT u.userNo, u.userNickname, u.userName, u.userId, u.userPhoneNo, ( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchaseComptbl WHERE postID IN (SELECT postID FROM productPosttbl WHERE userNo = u.userNo)) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchaseComptbl WHERE buyerNo = u.userNo) ) AS transactionCount, u.userGrade, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM productPosttbl WHERE userNo = u.userNo) AS postCount, CASE WHEN u.userValidity = 1 THEN 'X' WHEN u.userValidity = 0 THEN 'O' ELSE NULL END AS userValidity FROM usertbl u WHERE u.userNo >= 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchasecomptbl (purchasecompid, postid, buyerno, PURCHASECOMPDATE) SELECT purchasecomptbl_seq.nextval, postid, buyerno, sysdate FROM chatroomtbl WHERE roomid = #{roomId}
mapper.select: SELECT p.userno FROM chatroomtbl c INNER JOIN productPosttbl p ON c.postid = p.postid WHERE c.roomid = #{roomId}
SELECT p.* FROM purchasecomptbl p INNER JOIN chatroomtbl c ON p.postid = c.postid WHERE c.roomid = #{roomId}

SELECT ( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchaseComptbl WHERE postID IN (SELECT postID FROM productPosttbl WHERE userNo = u.userNo)) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchaseComptbl WHERE buyerNo = u.userNo) ) AS transactionCount FROM usertbl u WHERE u.userno = #{userno}
SELECT U.usergrade from usertbl U inner join productposttbl P ON U.userno = P.userno where P.postid = #{prodId}
